Note: Followed immediately by 2850; for a variant see 2836.
Title(s): ‘Here men mai see hou Oure Lord Ihu Crist schadde his precious blood VIJ tymes aȝens þe VII deedli synnes’
_description: ‘Here men mai see hou Oure Lord Ihu Crist schadde his precious blood VIJ tymes aȝens þe VII deedli synnes’ — seven stanzas generally in 8 lines each

Bod789.First Lines:
IHesu for þi precious bloodþat þou sthaddist for
                    oure good…
Bod789.Last Lines:
…Delyuere hem out þat ben þerynneand kep us in
                    parfiit charite
Bod789.Note:
Eight irregularly rhymed stanzas generally 8 lines in each, all
                    beginning with ‘IHesu for þi precious blood / þat þou
                    sthaddist for oure good’; written as prose.
Bod789.Attributed Title:
Here men mai see hou Oure Lord Ihu Crist schadde his precious blood VIJ
                    tymes aȝens þe VII deedli synnes (f. 147v)
